description.oldValue:
When joining a meeting in a Microsoft Teams Rooms with a personal laptop running Microsoft Teams, the video galleries on both the Teams Room and laptops will be optimized to display only remote attendees.  (Proximity Join with Microsoft Teams Rooms is required).
GA date: December CY2022
description.newValue:
When joining a meeting in a Microsoft Teams Rooms
with a personal laptop running Microsoft Teams, the video galleries on both the
Teams Room and laptops will be optimized to display only remote
attendees.  (Proximity Join with Microsoft Teams Rooms is required).
